faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Can I upgrade my plan later?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time. Your payment will be prorated based on the remaining time in your current subscription.
faq.answer2: We offer special academic pricing for students with a valid university email. Contact our support team for more information.
faq.question3: What's included in the survival mode?
faq.answer3: Survival mode features timed exercises with increasing difficulty, testing your ability to solve quantitative finance problems under pressure. Freemium users get access to the first wave, while subscribers unlock all challenges.
faq.answer4: Pro subscribers receive verifiable certificates upon completion of course modules. These certificates can be directly integrated with LinkedIn and showcase the specific quantitative finance skills you've mastered.

fundamentals.description: Master the essential building blocks of quantitative finance with our beginner-friendly courses. No prior experience required.

timeValue.title: Time Value of Money
timeValue.description: Understand the core financial concept of how money's value changes over time

blackScholes.title: Black-Scholes Model
blackScholes.description: Learn the cornerstone model for option pricing that revolutionized financial markets

vanillaOptions.title: Vanilla Options
vanillaOptions.description: Explore the fundamentals of call and put options and their trading strategies

impliedVol.title: Implied Volatility Basics
impliedVol.description: Understand how the market's expectation of volatility is derived from option prices

deltaHedging.title: Delta Hedging
deltaHedging.description: Learn the fundamental technique for managing options risk using the underlying asset

intermediate.description: Build on your knowledge with more advanced models and techniques. Some basic understanding of options and probability is recommended.

binomialTrees.title: Binomial & Trinomial Trees
binomialTrees.description: Master tree-based methods for pricing options and other derivatives

americanOptions.title: American Options
americanOptions.description: Explore the pricing and early exercise decisions for American-style options

localVol.title: Local Volatility
localVol.description: Understand how to model volatility that varies across strike prices and expiration dates

greeks.title: Option Greeks
greeks.description: Master the sensitivity measures that describe how option prices change with market conditions

monteCarlo.title: Monte Carlo Methods
monteCarlo.description: Learn simulation techniques essential for pricing complex derivatives

advanced.description: Dive into sophisticated models, exotic products, and professional-grade pricing techniques. For experienced practitioners and aspiring quants.

exoticOptions.title: Exotic Options
exoticOptions.description: Explore complex derivatives beyond standard calls and puts

structuredProducts.title: Structured Products
structuredProducts.description: Master the design and pricing of packaged investment strategies

stochasticModels.title: Stochastic Models
stochasticModels.description: Implement advanced stochastic processes for more accurate pricing

smileSkew.title: Volatility Smile & Skew
smileSkew.description: Understand and model the non-flat implied volatility patterns observed in markets

xva.title: XVA Framework
xva.description: Master the valuation adjustments crucial for modern derivatives pricing

stochasticRates.title: Stochastic Interest Rates
stochasticRates.description: Implement models for interest rate derivatives with stochastic processes

mlPricing.title: Machine Learning Pricing
mlPricing.description: Apply cutting-edge ML techniques to financial modeling and derivatives pricing
